chapters.title: Prologue: Deceptive Appearances
chapters.info: Nianh, p. 18 (5)—Aes Sedai of unknown Ajah and former advisor to Queen Ethenielle of Kandor. She told Ethenielle that the Kandori Spire was a remnant of the Age of Legends and probably harmless. She disappeared without a trace after news of Elaida's deposition of Siuan Sanche and her subsequent ascension to the Amyrlin Seat. See also Materasu, Ethenielle Kirukan.
